summary: Please note: this is not a mod. A simple and small reference for modders of Skyrim that would like to preview the voices they are giving to their Actors. I couldn\'t find any way to do so without actually setting the voice and visiting the actor - and it seems no-one has uploaded something like this anywhere so - enjoy, and happy modding.
descriptionHtml:
...And on that day a bunch of yarl\'s men came around, people were rewarded, and children and elderly beat up. 

For modders of Skyrim that would like to preview the voices they are giving to their Actors. I couldn\'t find any way to do so without actually setting the voice and visiting the actor - and it seems no-one has uploaded something like this anywhere so - enjoy, and happy modding.

You may wish to download the videos, refer to them here, or on Youtube.
[center]
[youtube]Y-NT0kGBUMA[/youtube]     [youtube]8UXPIJERI4Y[/youtube]
[/center]

Any comments, or suggestions, or pointers as to who\'s already done this and why I wasted 2 hours are always welcome.
author: Ian Longiaru
